thread.title: Trendy and nice boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Trendy and nice boutique hotel - Review of NYLO New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nabil325
title: Trendy and nice boutique hotel
text: Trendy and nice boutique hotel on the upper west side with nice bar and lounge. The rooms are comfortable and clean. The check-in process was excellent and the hotel gives out a voucher for a free at the hotel bar. The bar tender Anna was courteous and pleasant to chat with. Highly recommend the hotel. Reasonably priced.
